The ankou is a monster that drops ankou residue. It can be spawned by using the ankou agitator on ten ankou that are out of combat. Ankou residue is required to complete a Kili's Knowledge IV task.

Despite regular ankous counting towards ankou, ghosts, skeletons, and undead Slayer assignments, this ankou only counts as an ankou.
